dataQuery.sqlStatement: SELECT s.shipment_xid, con.first_name || ' ' || con.last_name document_mgr, sref.shipment_refnum_value booking_confirmation FROM shipment s INNER JOIN shipment_refnum sref ON sref.shipment_gid = s.shipment_gid AND sref.shipment_refnum_qual_gid = 'CHARTER VOYAGE' LEFT OUTER JOIN shipment_involved_party sip ON s.shipment_gid = sip.shipment_gid LEFT OUTER JOIN contact con ON con.contact_gid = sip.involved_party_contact_gid AND sip.involved_party_qual_gid = 'SCOULAR.DOCUMENT MANAGER' WHERE s.ATTRIBUTE_DATE10 <= SYSDATE + 7 AND (SELECT COUNT(s_ship_unit_gid) FROM s_ship_unit WHERE s_ship_unit_gid IN (SELECT s_ship_unit_gid FROM shipment_stop_d WHERE shipment_gid = s.shipment_gid AND stop_num=1)) > (SELECT COUNT(s_ship_unit_gid) FROM s_ship_unit_refnum WHERE s_ship_unit_refnum_qual_gid='SCOULAR/BCO.921-2 REPORT NUMBER' AND s_ship_unit_gid IN (SELECT s_ship_unit_gid FROM shipment_stop_d WHERE shipment_gid = s.shipment_gid AND stop_num=1))
